name: AniList Black Theme Basic
description:
Also known as: AniList High Contrast Dark Theme

Only has an effect when Anilist's dark theme is selected (button for that is at the bottom of every page). It now breaks the other themes so keep that in mind.

Alters the background to be pure black while making the text a bit lighter.
additional_info: Added text outline for profile names so they can be seen against white backgrounds.
